egov-security:config.jdbcUsersByUsernameQuery: SELECT MBER_ID AS USER_ID, ESNTL_ID AS PASSWORD, 1 ENABLED, MBER_NM AS USER_NM, ESNTL_ID FROM TN_FEIS_GNRLMBER m WHERE MBER_ID = ?
egov-security:config.jdbcAuthoritiesByUsernameQuery: SELECT A.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID USER_ID, A.AUTHOR_CODE AUTHORITY FROM TN_FEIS_EMPLYRSCRTYESTBS A, TN_FEIS_GNRLMBER B WHERE A.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = B.ESNTL_ID AND B.MBER_ID = ?

egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlHierarchicalRoles: SELECT a.CHLDRN_ROLE as child, a.PARNTS_ROLE parent FROM TN_FEIS_ROLES_HIERARCHY a LEFT JOIN TN_FEIS_ROLES_HIERARCHY b on (a.CHLDRN_ROLE = b.PARNTS_ROLE)
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndUrl: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN url, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM TN_FEIS_ROLEINFO a, TN_FEIS_AUTHORROLERELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'url' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndMethod: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN as "method", b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM TN_FEIS_ROLEINFO a, TN_FEIS_AUTHORROLERELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'method' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRolesAndPointcut: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN pointcut, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM TN_FEIS_ROLEINFO a, TN_FEIS_AUTHORROLERELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'pointcut' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
egov-security:secured-object-config.sqlRegexMatchedRequestMapping: SELECT a.ROLE_PTTRN uri, b.AUTHOR_CODE authority FROM TN_FEIS_ROLEINFO a, TN_FEIS_AUTHORROLERELATE b WHERE a.ROLE_CODE = b.ROLE_CODE AND a.ROLE_TY = 'regex' ORDER BY a.ROLE_SORT
